data.title: The Best Garage Floor Coatings and Epoxy Flooring Services
data.meta_description: We offer the best garage floor coatings and commercial epoxy flooring services in Kansas City, Tampa, Dallas, Huntsville, Birmingham, and Denver.
data.text:
Why Polyurea Concrete Is Better Than Epoxy for Garage Floors & Outdoor Spaces

From its ability to prevent damage to being more affordable, polyurea and non-porous concrete solutions are better for home and business owners. Whether you want a new concrete application for inside or outside your property, polyurea is the best choice for you.

Here’s why:

Superior durability to heat and UV.

Able to withstand harsh impacts, spills, and other wear and tear.

Adapts to concrete surfaces and offers greater flexibility.

Optimal for everyday use, such as foot and vehicle traffic.

Able to maintain a shiny, beautiful appearance for longer.

Fully Licensed and Insured

Garage floors, outdoor patios, and driveways can sustain a lot of wear and tear over the years. Our fully licensed and insured team provides the ultimate protection for your garage floor, residential space, or commercial space from foot traffic, spills, UV rays, moisture, temperature changes, and other threats to your concrete.

Prioritizing your property’s security and quality, every customer gets a 5-star review experience. When you choose us, you’ll receive world-class coatings from world-class professionals, ensuring top quality, safety, and exceptional style for years.

See What Our Customers Have to Say!

Why Choose Polyurea Over Epoxy

Most companies still install epoxy flooring in your home. This is a no-no for your garage floor or any space that is not temperature-controlled. Polyurea and polyaspartic coatings are 4x stronger and 10x more flexible than epoxy. Unlike epoxy flooring, our coatings will not de-flake, delaminate, or peel due to temperature changes. WE FIX TONS OF EXOXY COATINGS IN GARAGE FLOORS. These outdated systems are still sold to the consumer today and are highly frowned upon. Check out our industry articles here to stay up-to-date on the latest garage floor coating news!

We offer several types of grip additives that can make your coatings slip-resistant. Our coatings don’t warp, fade, or deteriorate when exposed to harsh UV rays or inclement weather.

Patriot Coatings LLC
